boost/python/eigen/specializations.hpp

00004 #include <boost/python/eigen/PythonMatrix.hpp>
00005 #include <boost/python/eigen/eigen_to_python.hpp>
00006 #include <boost/python/eigen/return_internal_matrix.hpp>
00007 
00008 #define BOOST_PYTHON_EIGEN_TO_PYTHON_VALUE(ARGS, TYPE, CV)              \
00009     namespace boost { namespace python {                                \
00010     template < ARGS >                                                   \
00011     struct to_python_value< TYPE CV > : public detail::builtin_to_python { \
00012         inline PyObject * operator()(TYPE CV x) const {                 \
00013             try {                                                       \
00014                 object r = eigen_to_python< TYPE >::to_python_value(x); \
00015                 Py_INCREF(r.ptr());                                     \
00016                 return r.ptr();                                         \
00017             } catch (error_already_set & exc) {                         \
00018                 handle_exception();                                     \
00019                 return NULL;                                            \
00020             }                                                           \
00021         }                                                               \
00022         inline PyTypeObject const * get_pytype() const {                \
00023             return converter::object_manager_traits<numpy::matrix>::get_pytype(); \
00024         }                                                               \
00025     };                                                                  \
00026     }}
00027 
00028 #define BOOST_PYTHON_EIGEN_ARG_TO_PYTHON(ARGS, TYPE)                    \
00029     namespace boost { namespace python { namespace converter {          \
00030         template < ARGS >                                               \
00031         struct arg_to_python< TYPE > : public handle<> {                \
00032             inline arg_to_python(TYPE const & v) :                      \
00033                 handle<>(python::to_python_value<TYPE const &>()(v)) {} \
00034         };                                                              \
00035     }}}
00036 
00037 #define BOOST_PYTHON_EIGEN_FROM_PYTHON_AUTO(ARGS, TYPE)                 \
00038     namespace boost { namespace python { namespace converter {          \
00039     template < ARGS >                                                   \
00040     struct arg_rvalue_from_python< TYPE const & > {                     \
00041         typedef TYPE result_type;                                       \
00042         typedef typename TYPE::Scalar _Scalar;                          \
00043         typedef Eigen::PythonMatrix<_Scalar, TYPE::RowsAtCompileTime,TYPE::ColsAtCompileTime> PythonMatrix; \
00044         arg_rvalue_from_python(PyObject * p) : _p(borrowed(p)) {}       \
00045         bool convertible() const {                                      \
00046             try {                                                       \
00047                 object arg(_p);                                         \
00048                 numpy::matrix m(arg, numpy::dtype::get_builtin<_Scalar>()); \
00049                 PythonMatrix pm(m);                                     \
00050                 _p = handle<>(borrowed(m.ptr()));                       \
00051             } catch (error_already_set & exc) {                         \
00052                 PyErr_Clear();                                          \
00053                 return false;                                           \
00054             }                                                           \
00055             return true;                                                \
00056         }                                                               \
00057         result_type operator()() const {                                \
00058             boost::numpy::matrix m(python::detail::borrowed_reference(_p.get())); \
00059             PythonMatrix pm(m);                                         \
00060             return result_type(pm);                                     \
00061         }                                                               \
00062     private:                                                            \
00063         mutable handle<> _p;                                            \
00064     };                                                                  \
00065     }}}

00067 #define EIGEN_MATRIX_ARGS typename Scalar, int Rows, int Cols, int Options, int MaxRows, int MaxCols
00068 #define EIGEN_MATRIX_TYPE Eigen::Matrix<Scalar,Rows,Cols,Options,MaxRows,MaxCols>
00069 BOOST_PYTHON_EIGEN_TO_PYTHON_VALUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_ARGS, EIGEN_MATRIX_TYPE, &)
00070 BOOST_PYTHON_EIGEN_TO_PYTHON_VALUE(EIGEN_MATRIX_ARGS, EIGEN_MATRIX_TYPE, const &)
00071 BOOST_PYTHON_EIGEN_ARG_TO_PYTHON(EIGEN_MATRIX_ARGS, EIGEN_MATRIX_TYPE)
00072 BOOST_PYTHON_EIGEN_FROM_PYTHON_AUTO(EIGEN_MATRIX_ARGS, EIGEN_MATRIX_TYPE)
00073 #undef EIGEN_MATRIX_ARGS
00074 #undef EIGEN_MATRIX_TYPE
